Reviews.Title: “Wonderful location”
Reviews.Author: ElizaGunn
Reviews.Content: found hotel conveniently placed san marco square staff extremely pleasant helpful clean towels changed day breakfast adequate carnival time venice extremely crowded expensive travel water bus expensive remembered previous visits travel cards advertised carnival trip paid separately buy return tickets lido scanned buy single tickets expensive 10 minutes water total 39 euros

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for location - but not a four star hotel as claimed”
Reviews.Author: Heaths99
Reviews.Content: location st marks square assume thats star status italy sort bruise shins try navigate bed bathroom miniscule plus linen appeared clean teacoffee facilities bar late night cuppa request met disdain begrudgingly fulfilled breakfast basic usual buffet fare travelling friends stayed hotel loved guests staying venetian guest house streets st marks rated highly youre clean night breakfast wouldnt recommend hotel price
